tooltip: Select Mirora, Chief of the Mudmen, as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Mirora focuses on improving Mudmen units.
Allows you to summon Chief Mirora, a fast mounted hero that attacks with claws and teeth.
Fast Melee Creature unit that cannot be countered by Anti-Creature units.
Replaces Laborers with Mudmen, who are more durable and can attack enemies.
Mudmen Laborers, Jabbers, and Wolfkillers' Dodge Rate is improved.
